name: Puzzles of the Dice
description:
This is not a complete game. I just wanted to make a little thing for my first game jam.

To get better games, check out my itch.io page for my new game, currently in open beta, or see any other game dev on YouTube.

Puzzles of the Dice is a mini-submission to the 2022 GMTK Game Jam, about dice-based movement puzzles.

If you're crazy enough to actually like this stupid game, you can download it too.
